title: Best of The Program | Guests: Dr. Richard Bartlett & Harvey Rosenfield | 8/10/20
description:
CNN’s Brian Stelter suggests that conservative talk radio is dangerous and out to get Joe Biden. California Gov. Gavin Newsom is going after private tutors. Acclaimed doctor Richard Bartlett may have found the “silver bullet” for the coronavirus, and it’s a common respiratory medicine. Consumer advocate Harvey Rosenfield explains how our phone data is being used to create “secret surveillance scores.”
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
